cool_elytra.midnightconfig.title: Cool Elytra Config
cool_elytra.midnightconfig.text_mode: §aDetermines which behavior to use. §21: camera rolling, 2: realistic flight, 0: disable
cool_elytra.midnightconfig.wingPower.too: Set to 0 to disable all camera rolling.
cool_elytra.midnightconfig.text_rollSmoo: §aSmooths changes to the camera's roll angle. §2Closer to 1 is smoother, 1 stops roll.
